mapper.insert: INSERT INTO articleLike SET regDate = NOW(), articleId = #{id}, memberId = #{memberId}, `point` = 1
mapper.select: SELECT A.*, M.name AS extra__writer, IFNULL(SUM(AL.point), 0) AS extra__likePoint FROM article AS A INNER JOIN board AS B ON A.boardId = B.id INNER JOIN `member` AS M ON A.memberId = M.id LEFT JOIN articleLike AS AL ON A.id = AL.articleId WHERE B.code = #{boardCode} GROUP BY A.id ORDER BY A.id DESC
